website_summaries.verdict: While pricey, this option offers durability and great ambiance with a clean, stainless steel look.
pros: Heats up quickly and produces 18,000 BTU with a burn time of four to six hours
Easy installation, and easy to use
cons: This does go through a fair amount of fuel if you use it a lot, so consider finding a source where you can buy fuel in bulk

customer_reviews.title: This one is good
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one from different seller, different brands. This one is good. The other one, fire would not stay lite, maybe bad design. I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: It looks great mounted on a tile wall. The cabinet itself isn't really substantial but the three fireboxes that hold the fuel and produce the flame are first rate. The seams where the various pieces of cabinet are joined are a little lacking on workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip D. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Had a manufacturer defect.
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks nice. But we had to return it because they left the screws out of the inside top piece. Since the back of it has rivets there is no way to fix it. We are getting another sent to us. Amazon was great about the return. We called moda flame and left a message but never heard back(was trying to see if they could give us some idea on how to fix it before we sent it back). End of the day it looks nice but Moda Flame quality control is lacking.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: The fire place installed easily and makes our living room look beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The fire place installed easily and makes our living room look beautiful. We get complements on it as soon as people come into our home.
customer_reviews.author: Trudyanne Burovic

customer_reviews.title: 5 star Fireplace!
customer_reviews.text: I loveeeeeee this fireplace!! Very easy to use! 5stars. It does require a lot of ethanol fuel to keep using it over and over so buy it in bulk ! It give off alotttt of heat very quickly! perfect for this extra cold nights or when the power goes out! This was the perfect touch to my lavish penthouse! Lastly the flames get pretty high the longer it's in use. I had just ignited the flames when I took the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great look when a condo building cannot have a conventional ...
customer_reviews.text: I created an entire wall unit around this fireplace and it is turning out stunning. Thought not complete I posted a picture of what can be done with this fireplace. What a great look when a condo building cannot have a conventional fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Walter E. Lisowski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I in love wish my fire please . Good condition .
customer_reviews.author: Olya

customer_reviews.title: Buy it already!
customer_reviews.text: This fireplace is amazing! I highly recommend it to anyone looking to get away from woodburning and electirc fireplaces.
customer_reviews.author: jayden5505

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy...
customer_reviews.text: Great unit, easy to install. Looks great, we use it constantly during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Principe

customer_reviews.title: This is simply fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, quality made. TAKE YOUR TIME installing. I mounted mine with concrete lag bolts to my rear yard wall. I saw this for $700 at a home show, but got it on Amazon.com for $359. Well worth way more than $359. The flames from the 3 ports are beautiful and gently. This is all about "ambiance". It does exactly what it's supposed to do. I would not recommend this for indoor use, but for outdoor it's fabulous. No smell from unit while operating. Suggest having a good Stainless Steel cleaner. I use "Perfect Stainless" brand cleaner you can get on Amazon or Home Depot.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Lee

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I like it alot, although mounting brackets are about 37 inches apart so it does not line up with studs. I dont quite understand the price because its just a metal box with containers to hold the fuel. You might know that the fuel is pricey. If you buy in bulk like myself dont settle for the 36qt for 200$. Regal flame websight or somtimes Walmart will sell 48qt for 210$. Ill put 2 quarts in the fireplace for about a 3hr burn. I want another one for downstairs but at a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: invest in this
customer_reviews.text: I love it, one of best investment i made in my home. .me being a new home owner, i took full advantage of the stainless steel clean lines look and made it one of the center pieces in my living room. . Burns clean, no allergies, small smell and very nice sexy look to it. . I suggest it to anyone without a fireplace and allergies. I was little hesitant it being so new and me being a plumber but it worked out well. .
customer_reviews.author: EDWARD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fireplace! Easy to use, modern look, and efficient room warming alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Alisia

customer_reviews.title: Love it. High quality and add beauty to any ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. High quality and add beauty to any decor. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Super cool looking unit
customer_reviews.text: Super cool looking unit. We have not installed it into our homes yet, but have sever planned. I am a general contractor, building Earth Advantage Homes, and this is a nice sealed alternative to Natural Gas, while getting the ascetics of a Fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product; not great for following reasons. Flames last about 90 mins (even with vent 1/2 shut), and the flame is not continuous, but 3 seperate.
customer_reviews.author: NYC99

customer_reviews.title: Happy Warm Customer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Was very surprised at how much heat come out! Love how easy it is to fill and no cleaning up when your done!
customer_reviews.author: sdl

product_meta.title: Regal Flame Elite Lenox Ventless Bio Ethanol Recessed or Wall Mounted Fireplace
product_meta.description: The 54 Inch Lenox ethanol fireplace brings elegance and awe to any room with its sleek stainless steel frame. Its three burner flame makes a dramatic statement in any room. No need to worry about venting, building a chimney or running any gas lines as it burns clean Regal Flame ethanol fireplace fuel. Its as simple as pouring the Regal fuel into the burner and lighting it with an extended lighter to enjoy the real flame ambiance. With the ethanol fireplace, you have no more need to haul wood, run electric or gas lines. Recommended to be used only with Regal Fuel ethanol fireplace fuel which is smokeless, soot free, and odorless. In addition, you may use this fireplace outdoor as a fire pit or convert Gas Logs, Wood Log, Electric Log, Electric Fireplace Insert or Wood Burning Fireplace Insert to ethanol has never been easier. This fireplace is eco-friendly, and ventless that burns ethanol fireplace fuel.
feature_bullets: DESIGNED FOR: This Regal Flame built in recessed wall mounted ethanol fire pit fireplace is an absolute perfect addition to any room. It can either be recessed into a wall or wall mounted as simple as a flat panel screen TV with wall mount. With ethanol, you no longer need to run gas lines for Gas Logs, firewood logs for Wood Log fireplaces, Electric for electric fireplaces, Electric Fireplace Insert or Wood Burning Fireplace

HEAT: Easily produces 18,000 BTUs to warm a room of 1200 sq. ft. with a dancing flame of 12-14 inch in height. No more need to store and log wood, own a firewood rack, waste time on lighting and cleaning up ashes. Does not require any venting at all

REAL FLAME: Unlike electric fireplaces inserts, Tealight Fireplace Log, candle holders, Hurricane Candleholders, Gel Fireplace Fuel Cans, gas, firewood logs, smoke, and no ash clean up. This bio ethanol burner fireplace provides an open real flame that burns completely ventless & Vent Free, soot free, ash free, easy light and extinguish

SPECIFICATIONS: This Regal Flame bio ethanol fireplace includes and runs on three 1.5 liter adjustable burner that is made from a high quality 430 Stainless Steel and is completely vent free. Regal Flame Ethanol Fireplace Fuel and does not need electric, gas, chimney, venting, or fireplace gel cans. At maximum capacity, this burner's flame lasts approximately 4-6 hours (depending on room temperature and climate). The overall dimensions of this ethanol fireplace is 53.5W x 21.3H x 5.7D Inches

100%SATISFACTION GUARANTEED! Regal Flame produces quality fireplaces, fire pits, gas logs, firewood racks, covers, accessories and more, at affordable prices and is dedicated to address any product/service issues and is committed to delivering a 5 star experience for all buyers, Please remember not to ever pour/refill fuel onto open fire or when burner/fireplace is not cool to touch
